item.description:
September Conversations will focus on a talk by Steven Pinker that presents, in brief, the reasons for his contention that “We are probably living in the most peaceful time in our species’ existence.” This is based on his book “The Better Angels of Our Nature: Why Violence Has Declined.” You can view the talk from the following link.
http://www.ted.com/talks/steven_pinker_on_the_myth_of_violence.html
Steven Pinker, one of the world's leading experts on language and the mind, explores the idea of human nature and its moral, emotional, and political colorings.
Refreshments will be served.
item.how_to_find_us: We will probably be upstairs in the library, or in the social hall.
item.name: Conversations: Steven Pinker on the Myth of Violence
